mapper.sql: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ID, O.CART_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.NAME, O.EMAIL, O.PHONE, O.AMOUNT, O.WINE_NAME, O.WINE_PRICE, O.RENAMED_FILENAME FROM BBN_ORDER O
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, C.CART_ID, M.ID, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, W.AMOUNT, W.WINENAME, W.WINEPRICE, W.RENAMED_FILENAME FROM BBN_ORDER O LEFT JOIN CART C ON O.ORDER_ID = C.CART_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON O.ORDER_ID = M.ID WHERE O.CART_ID = C.CART_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBN_ORDER ( ORDER_ID, CART_ID, ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, AMOUNT, WINE_NAME, WINE_PRICE, RENAMED_FILENAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_ID.NEXTVAL, SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{amount}, #{wineName}, #{winePrice}, #{renamedFileName} )
